title: Corrupted Files
body: I played a normal game to test my computer, no troubles, went into ranked and when the game started it said files corrupted, the game is still currently going on... help?

replies.body:
You will need to repair your client, sounds like your Hard drive is about on the end of its life. I would run check disk to find bad sectors and see if you can not use those bad sectors.

Let me know how that goes.

-SumCoolAid
Is that how you're explaining that he got a normal game running, but his ranked game was stuffed? I'm just a bit confused, is all.
